name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Detail-oriented Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance applications. Proven expertise in **testing**, particularly with an emphasis on **API** testing and **automation** strategies. Strong analytical skills complemented by proficiency in **documentation** and **reporting**. Adept in using **collaborative tools** to foster communication and teamwork across departments.

Skilled in JavaScript/TypeScript, Python, and Flutter, with hands-on experience in both frontend and backend development using **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms that support predictive analytics, automation, and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, and implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines.

Well-versed in compliance-driven development, aligning solutions with HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2 standards. Strong background in MLOps, including model training, serving, and orchestration using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**.

experience.responsibilities:
Implemented robust **testing** strategies across the stack using Jest, Cypress, Postman, and PyTest, ensuring comprehensive coverage of unit, integration, E2E, and contract-level tests to enhance software quality.
Conducted thorough **documentation** and **reporting** for testing results, clear communication of defects, and collaborating with development teams to ensure streamlined bug resolution.
Utilized **automation** frameworks in various stages of the software development lifecycle, improving testing efficiency and reliability while reducing manual intervention by **30%**.
Actively participated in **collaborative tools** such as JIRA and Confluence for tracking testing progress, managing test cases, and maintaining comprehensive documentation for future reference.
Engaged in continuous improvement through **analytical skills**, assessing test results and application performance to suggest enhancements to existing processes.
Designed and built full-stack platforms for healthcare and fintech using Python (**FastAPI**), TypeScript, and **Node.js**, paired with modern front-end frameworks like **React (17–18)**, **Next.js**, and **Vue 3**, ensuring full compliance with HIPAA, FHIR, GDPR, PCI DSS, and SOX.
Delivered mobile applications for iOS and Android using **Flutter** and **React Native**, implementing native modules and managing state with Provider and **Redux** to support secure, real-time user interactions.
Created CI/CD pipelines tailored for mobile using **Fastlane** and **App Center**, incorporating test automation, release workflows, and crash analytics with **Firebase Crashlytics** and **Sentry**.
Led the transformation of legacy systems into microservices architectures, leveraging **Docker**, **Kubernetes (AKS/EKS)**, and serverless functions via **AWS Lambda** and **Azure Functions** for fault-tolerant, scalable deployments.
Built and maintained data infrastructure using **PostgreSQL**, **MongoDB**, **Redis**, and **GraphQL**, designed to support heavy data ingestion and real-time analytics for both health and finance domains.
Deployed ML models for risk scoring, fraud detection, and document classification using **scikit-learn**, **PyTorch**, and **TensorFlow**, with backend inference integrated into live systems.
Implemented MLOps workflows using **MLflow**, **DVC**, and **Airflow**, managing model training, validation, and deployment pipelines across development and production.
Integrated intelligent features into frontend applications, such as personalized dashboards, predictive health alerts, and financial summaries, powered by models hosted on **Azure ML** and **AWS Sagemaker**.
Built DevOps pipelines using **GitHub Actions**, **CircleCI**, and **Azure DevOps**, with full test automation, linting, security checks, and multi-environment deployment workflows.
Developed advanced data visualization tools with **D3.js**, **Chart.js**, and **Power BI Embedded**, enabling real-time analysis of financial activity, fraud trends, and operational KPIs.
Collaborated closely with ML teams to deploy NLP models (**spaCy**, **Hugging Face Transformers**) for document parsing and anomaly detection, exposed through secured REST APIs.
Integrated search capabilities with **Azure Cognitive Search** and **Elasticsearch**, supporting fast and flexible querying across structured and unstructured health and financial datasets.

Conduct thorough **API** testing to ensure the reliability and performance of systems, utilizing **automation** tools to enhance efficiency and coverage.
Leverage **collaborative tools** like JIRA and Confluence for effective project management and documentation, supporting cross-team communication and project alignment.
Develop detailed **documentation** for test cases, procedures, and reporting, ensuring compliance with **ISTQB** standards and practices for the QA process.
Utilize strong **analytical skills** to interpret complex data sets and identify testing requirements, contributing to sound testing strategies and execution plans.
Engage in regular communication with software developers and product teams to foster collaboration and ensure the timely delivery of high-quality software.
Implement automated testing frameworks, enhancing code review and analysis through the usage of tools like Selenium and Postman.
Monitor and report on testing progress, defect rates, and testing success metrics, leveraging data to drive actionable insights and improvements.
Contribute to a culture of quality assurance within the team, promoting best practices in testing and validation of financial systems to maintain high standards of performance.

Ensured the quality of backend services through rigorous testing methodologies, enhancing API reliability for a global e-commerce platform built using **Python (FastAPI, Django)** and **Node.js (NestJS, Express)**.
Automated testing processes using collaborative tools for integration and regression testing, resulting in a **30% reduction in bug resolution time**.
Conducted detailed documentation of testing strategies and results, facilitating improved communication amongst cross-functional teams and ensuring project transparency.
Developed comprehensive test cases and reporting mechanisms covering both frontend (utilizing **React (18), Vue 3, Angular**) and backend technologies, thereby increasing test coverage to **95%**.
Leveraged analytical skills to identify areas for improvement in existing functionalities, resulting in a **20% decrease in customer-reported issues**.
Employed ISTQB principles to create a structured testing environment that included manual and automated test suites, thereby contributing to continuous integration pipelines.
Supported collaborative toolsets in managing bug tracking and test case documentation, enhancing team productivity and stakeholder communication throughout the testing phases.
Utilized APIs to facilitate automated testing environments, increasing testing efficiency with a framework optimized for high-load scenarios.
Contributed to A/B testing and feature flags implementation to optimize user experiences and performance gains, in line with operational KPIs.
Provided real-time reporting and insights post-testing phases to monitor performance based on user feedback and operational metrics.
